attributes.action: Reverse Sunday Parking Charges in Glasgow City Centre
attributes.background: Parking charges being introduced to Glasgow City Centre is a tax on the working class. A nail in the coffin of our retail and service sector in Glasgow.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Parking permits are the responsibility of private car park operators or the local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
